comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_von_Krobatin "Alexander Freiherr von Krobatin (12 September 1849 – 28 September 1933) was an Austrian Field Marshal and Imperial Minister for War between 1912 and 1917."

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks artolog, I'll ask to include his full name in our record. Adding to artolog's post, do note that Freiherr is not a name, it's a title. It  is approximately the same as Baron in British peerage.
